app.totaraconnectdescription: Access tokens are used to authenticate with the API without needing a user and password.
app.totaraconnecttokenlisttext: Existing tokens for your user account:
app.copytokensuccess:
Token copied to clipboard.

Save this token in a Totara instance with Totara Connect installed.
app.deletetokenconfirm:
Deleting this token will block any applications using it from accessing the API.

Do you want to continue?
app.publishsuccess:
Course published successfully.

It will now be available for selection in any linked Totara installs.
app.publishdisabled:
SCORM tracking must be enabled before course can be published.

You can do this by adding the Spoor plugin in Manage extensions
